mapper.select: select a.user_id, a.name, a.phone, a.email, b.business_no, b.store_name, b.open_date, b.zipcode, b.addr_road, b.addr_jibun from tb_user a, TB_BUSINESS b where a.user_id = b.user_id and tax_agent =#{taxAgentId}

select a.user_id, name, phone, email, store_name, business_no, store_name, zipcode, addr_road, addr_jibun, addr_detail, open_date from tb_user a, TB_BUSINESS b where a.user_id = b.user_id and business_no =#{businessNo}

select receipt_code, sum(calsum) as receipt_kind_purchase from(select RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630' union select RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630') group by receipt_code

select sum(calsum) as purchase_sum, sum(amount) as purchase_amount, sum(vat) purchase_vat from (select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630')

select receipt_date, RECEIPT_CODE, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, store_name, amount, vat, calSum from (select to_char(to_date(receipt_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as receipt_date, RECEIPT_CODE, SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 5) as SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, store_name, amount, vat, calSum from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_status='P' and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630' union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO=#{businessNo} and receipt_date between '20210301' and '20210630') order by receipt_date desc) where rownum <= 20
select sum(approval_amount) as slaesSum from tb_card_sales where business_no=#{businessNo} and deal_date between '20210101' and '20210630'

select a.name, store_name, SUBSTR(business_no, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(business_no, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(business_no, 5) as business_no, addr_jibun from tb_user a, tb_business b where a.user_id = b.user_id and business_no=#{businessNo}

select receipt_date, RECEIPT_CODE, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, store_name, amount, vat, calSum from (select to_char(to_date(receipt_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as receipt_date, RECEIPT_CODE, SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, 5) as SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO, store_name, amount, vat, calSum from(select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, STORE_NAME, amount, vat, amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from tb_receipt where BUSINESS_NO='6052355236' and receipt_status='P'
and receipt_date between #{selectYear}||'0101' and #{selectYear}||'0630'
and receipt_date between #{selectYear}||'0701' and #{selectYear}||'1231'
union select decode(receipt_code, '001','세금계산서','002','계산서','003','카드영수증','004','간이영수증','005','현금영수증') as RECEIPT_CODE, store_name, amount, vat,amount+vat as calSum, receipt_date, SUPPLIER_BUSINESS_NO from TB_PURCHASE where BUSINESS_NO='6052355236'
and receipt_date between #{selectYear}||'0101' and #{selectYear}||'0630')
and receipt_date between #{selectYear}||'0701' and #{selectYear}||'1231')
order by receipt_date desc) where rownum <= 20
